> [styromaniac](#comment_2759_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): I'm legitimately afraid of this mostly untested vaccine, but this post sounds like nonsense to me.
Bill Gates  has been sterilizing Africans for the past 2 decades. Most recently the Chinese have been doing it to Tibetans. Faking vaccines to sterilize the population isn't anything new at least.  I'm willing to look into what seems to be the unbelievable these days since every so called "conspiracy theory" I've come across throughout the years have turned out to be true. Maybe we are just getting old, what we used to think of as sci-fi is quickly becoming reality and it makes it harder for us to take it seriously.

1607556822_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: No ones going to be right about everything 100% of the time but even if its "misinformation" you should let it run its course, let them do a full investigation and let everyone find out for themselves if its true or not.
